nodes.text: Zakxon Gewchi was a male Nautolan Mandalorian living during the Cold War. He was present at Tauntaun Ridge on Hoth, where he was killed around 3642 BBY.

Zakxon Gewchi appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Hoth. He is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
